name: Lemon Thins
author: KIMMEEA13
summary: These lemon cookies are very rich and satisfying! They taste best when taken out of the oven right as the edges turn brown.
directions: Sift flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a large bowl
Cream butter and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy
Add flour mixture gradually, beating well after each addition
Form dough into a log shape and wrap with waxed paper
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line cookie sheets with parchment paper
Slice chilled dough into roughly 1/8-inch slices
Place onto the prepared cookie sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set and golden, 7 to 8 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool completely, 15 to 30 minutes
Combine powdered sugar and lemon juice in a bowl until smooth
